instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1534: What is A1534? A1534 is a model number for a 12 inch size Macbook  from years 2015, 2016 with EMC 2746, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00045, 820-00244..
definitions.820-00244: What is 820-00244? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-00687: What is 820-00687? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: board compatability
threads.message: hi does anybody know if an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board would work in an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> that had an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00687</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> inside ??, the reason i ask is i cant find a replacement board for an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00687</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> but can for an <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
